name: Squash'emUp (Ludum Dare 41)
description:
First Ludum Dare participation result. First Itch.io upload.
You play a dude fending off hordes of alien robots using your squash racket. To do this you have to bounce the ball atleast once off a wall and hit them. By using the up to 3 bounces multiple enemies can be hit in one attempt.

It is recommended to download a standalone build.

LDJam page https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/squashemup
